item.title: Is a College Education Required for a Career in Game Design?
item.description: Want to Be a Video Game Designer? You MUST Read This First Wouldn’t it be great to turn your lifelong love of video games into a career? That’s the dream of almost every gamer. Consequently, jobs are incredibly competitive. What qualifications do you need to get a leg up on the competition? Here is some information to get you started. What Is the Job and Salary Outlook? The average yearly salaries for workers in the video game industry ranged from $49K for quality assurance testers to $107K for executives according to stats from the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics.
